alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:35AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Colbert, Franklin and southern Lawrence Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 434 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a small line of strong thunderstorms extending from 6 miles southwest of Leighton to near Littleville to 7 miles northwest of Belgreen to Tishomingo State Park. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Moulton, Phil Campbell, Littleville, Belgreen, Mt Hope, La Grange, Tharptown, Ne Smith and Rockwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
